entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:25 p.m. MST Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind east 30 km/h except 80 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h except 50 gusting to 70 near the Richardson mountains in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm over southern sections. Wind light except east 40 km/h gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 8 April 2023
